meanings.definition: A small, pointed end of a pin.
meanings.sent1: She carefully removed the pinheads from the cushion.
meanings.sent2: The tailor used pinheads to secure the fabric in place.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally pricked my finger on one of the pinheads.
meanings.sent4: The pinheads glinted in the sunlight like tiny stars.
meanings.sent5: The box was filled with shiny pinheads of various colors.

meanings.definition: A person with a small head or brain.
meanings.sent1: The children giggled at the cartoon character with pinheads.
meanings.sent2: Some people mistakenly believe that geniuses have pinheads.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly called his forgetful friend a pinhead.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the villain was portrayed as a pinhead with evil intentions.
meanings.sent5: The comedian made fun of himself, claiming to be a pinhead in math.
